task.maidspell.spell_combat.desc: Maid uses equipped spell books to cast spells in combat. Supports spell books in offhand, mainhand or backpack.
task.maidspell.spell_combat.condition.sp: Requires spell book (offhand, mainhand or backpack)
item.maidspell.spell_enhancement_core.us: Equip in maid's bauble slot to use
item.maidspell.bleeding_heart.desc1: A magical item imbued with powerful life force
item.maidspell.bleeding_heart.desc2: Converts 10% of damage dealt to enemies into healing
item.maidspell.bleeding_heart.desc3: Heals both the maid and her master
item.maidspell.flow_core.desc1: A magical core imbued with flowing life force
item.maidspell.flow_core.desc2: Continuously heals the maid, healing effect scales with favorability
item.maidspell.flow_core.desc3: Reduces damage taken, damage reduction scales with favorability
